tests.title: Returns a 200 status and an array of orders with correct properties
tests.fullTitle: Integration Tests for API /api/orders GET /api/orders Returns a 200 status and an array of orders with correct properties

tests.title: Returns a 404 status when no orders are found
tests.fullTitle: Integration Tests for API /api/orders GET /api/orders Returns a 404 status when no orders are found
tests.code:
const res = await request(app).get('/api/orders/9999'); // Nonexistent ID
expect(res.status).to.equal(404);
